Contact Us

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a suggestion for a guest, a topic you'd like us to cover, or just want to share your thoughts about the podcast, please don't hesitate to get in touch.

Get in Touch

  • Email: your-email@example.com
  • Twitter: @YourTwitterHandle
  • Instagram: @YourInstagramHandle

Suggest a Guest

Do you know someone doing interesting work in the climate solution space? We're always looking for guests who are driving innovation and change in their industries.

Please include in your message:

  • Name of potential guest
  • Their area of expertise/organization
  • Why you think they'd be a great fit for the podcast
  • Contact information (if available)

Sponsorship Inquiries

If you're interested in sponsoring the "Solving for Zero" podcast, please email us at sponsorship@example.com with details about your organization and how you think it aligns with our mission.
